Attribute.Name: Operation_Level
Attribute.Description: This is a common code and application defined. This column indicates the level at which the transaction operates. In specific applications, the operation level can be assigned at either the header or at line level of the transaction. When the header level operation is used, all lines associated to the header will be also be changed. On the other hand, if the operation is defined at the line level, only the specified line will be changed and its associated header will not be affected.

Attribute.Name: Visible_To_All
Attribute.Description: This flag determines whether the note applied should be visible to all users. This field is used for filtering. No logic is currently applied to it.
This flag indicates whether this organization requires payment processing.
Attribute.Name: Payment_Processing_Reqd

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether this organization requires chained order.
Attribute.Name: Requires_Chained_Order

Attribute.Description: This field is not currently used.
Attribute.Name: Requires_Change_Request

Attribute.Description: The default distribution rule that is associated with this organization.
Attribute.Name: Default_Distribution_Rule_Id

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether inventory in an organization is maintained within or outside the system.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Kept_Externally

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether inventory is published by the organization.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Published

Attribute.Description: The organization that owns the catalog of this organization.
Attribute.Name: Catalog_Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: The organization that owns the inventory of this organization.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: The organization that owns the pricing configuration for this organization.
Attribute.Name: Pricing_Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: The organization that owns the store configuration for this organization.
Attribute.Name: Store_Config_Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether this organization is a buyer.
Attribute.Name: Is_Buyer

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether this organization is a seller.
Attribute.Name: Is_Seller

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether this organization is a carrier.
Attribute.Name: Is_Carrier

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether this organization is a template.
Attribute.Name: Is_Template

Attribute.Description: The rule used for cross referencing items.
Attribute.Name: Item_Xref_Rule

Attribute.Description: The cross reference alias type.
Attribute.Name: Xref_Alias_Type

Attribute.Description: The tax payer identifier for the organization.
Attribute.Name: Taxpayer_Id

Attribute.Description: The tax jurisdiction to which the organization belongs.
Attribute.Name: Tax_Jurisdiction

Attribute.Description: This indicates whether the organization is exempt from taxes.
Attribute.Name: Tax_Exempt_Flag

Attribute.Description: The certificate of tax exemption.
Attribute.Name: Tax_Exemption_Certificate

Attribute.Description: The authority that issued tax exemption certificate.
Attribute.Name: Issuing_Authority

Attribute.Description: The nature of the authority that issued the tax exemption to the organization.
Attribute.Name: Authority_Type

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether sourcing is maintained for the organization.
Attribute.Name: Is_Sourcing_Kept

Attribute.Description: The account with the hub.
Attribute.Name: Account_With_Hub

Attribute.Description: The primary SIC code of the organization.
Attribute.Name: Primary_Sic_Code

Attribute.Description: The default payment rule the organization adopts.
Attribute.Name: Default_Payment_Rule_Id

Attribute.Description: The default price program that is associated with this organization.
Attribute.Name: Default_Price_Program_Key

Attribute.Description: The capacity organization for this organization.
Attribute.Name: Capacity_Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether this organization is a legal entity.
Attribute.Name: Is_Legal_Entity

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether sourcing is maintained for service items.
Attribute.Name: Is_Srvc_Sourcing_Kept

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether sourcing is maintained for delivery items.
Attribute.Name: Is_Del_Sourcing_Kept

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the capacity for the organization is kept externally.
Attribute.Name: Capacity_Kept_Externally

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the customers of the organization are maintained externally.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Maintained_Externally

Attribute.Description: The default fulfillment type to be used for the organization.
Attribute.Name: Default_Fulfillment_Type

Attribute.Description: The UCC prefix for the Organization.
Attribute.Name: UCC_Prefix

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the buyer organization requires value added services to be peformed on the item. If set to Y, the organization can specify a Service Item to be performed on the item.
Attribute.Name: Requires_Vas_Compliance

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the organization tracks supply externally. If set to 'Y', the system gets the supply picture from an external system and computes the availability based on the external supplies, and the demands kept within the system. Default value is 'N'.
Attribute.Name: Supply_Kept_Externally

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether inventory organization keeps supply and demand externally. If set to 'Y', the system publishes supply and demand to external system through events and there is no inventory updates in the system. Valid values are 'Y' or 'N'. When no value is set, supply and demand is kept internally.
Attribute.Name: Is_Supply_Demand_Kept_Externally

Attribute.Description: The suffix to apply to the organization code that is generated automatically when creating a customer. If this field is blank, organization code generation will not be performed.
Attribute.Name: Org_Suffix

Attribute.Description: Determines which organization maintains this organization's customers. If organization is an enterprise, it will default to itself. Otherwise, it will default to its primary enterprise's CustomerMasterOrganizationCode.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Master_Org_Code

Attribute.Description: Colony this Organization belongs to.
Attribute.Name: Assigned_Colony_Id

Attribute.Description: The SyncTarget that this Organization is assigned.
Attribute.Name: Sync_Target_ID

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the default distribution needs to be used.
Attribute.Name: Use_Default_Distribution

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the default order status rules needs to be used.
Attribute.Name: Use_Default_Order_Status_Rules

Attribute.Description: The tax payer identifier of the enterprise.
Attribute.Name: Taxpayer_Id

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether sourcing is maintained for the enterprise.
Attribute.Name: Is_Sourcing_Kept

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether sourcing is maintained for service items.
Attribute.Name: Is_Srvc_Sourcing_Kept

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether sourcing is maintained for delivery items.
Attribute.Name: Is_Del_Sourcing_Kept

Attribute.Description: The default distribution rule for the enterprise.
Attribute.Name: Default_Distribution_Rule_Id

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether a ship node has WMS7.0+ installed.
Attribute.Name: Dcm_Integration_Real_Time

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the node requires serial tracking in inventory. Supported values are Y and N. This attribute comes into play only when the catalog signifies that the serial number requires tracking in inventory. However, a node has a choice to override the inventory tracking preference to indicate that it is not needed.
Attribute.Name: Serial_Tracking

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether to track Serial information on Transfer. Valid values are Y and N.
Attribute.Name: Serial_Tracked_On_Transfer

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether to track Serial information during shipping. Valid values are Y and N.
Attribute.Name: Serial_Tracked_In_Shipping

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether to track Serial information during receiving.This receiveing includes return receiving. Valid values are REC(for receiving) and RET(for only returns).
Attribute.Name: Serial_Tracked_Receiving

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether to track tag information in inventory. Valid values are Y and N.
Attribute.Name: Tag_Tracked_In_Inventory

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether to track tag information during receiving. Valid values are Y and N.
Attribute.Name: Tag_Tracked_At_Receipt

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the manner in which orders are passed to a ship node for servicing ( "WMS_YANTRA","YFX","EVENTS" ).
Attribute.Name: Interface_Type

Attribute.Description: A sub-classification of the interface type.
Attribute.Name: Interface_Sub_Type

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the ship node requires change requests to manage order modifications after it is released to the node.
Attribute.Name: Requires_Change_Reqeust

Attribute.Description: The supplier who owns the ship node.
Attribute.Name: Supplier_Key

Attribute.Description: The type of pick-list that this ship node requires for picking.
Attribute.Name: Picklist_Type

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the ship node is a return center.
Attribute.Name: Return_Center_Flag

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether acceptance is required by the ship node before processing orders for shipping.
Attribute.Name: Acceptance_Required

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the BOL number needs to be generated for this ship node.
Attribute.Name: Generate_Bol_Number

Attribute.Description: The last generated BOL number.
Attribute.Name: Current_Bol_Number

Attribute.Description: The receiving calendar that is associated with this ship node.
Attribute.Name: Receiving_Calendar_Key

Attribute.Description: The shipping calendar that is associated with this ship node.
Attribute.Name: Shipping_Calendar_Key

Attribute.Description: The identifier of the tax payer for the ship node.
Attribute.Name: Export_Taxpayer_Id

Attribute.Description: The export license number given to the ship node.
Attribute.Name: Export_License_No

Attribute.Description: The date by which an export license given to a ship node expires.
Attribute.Name: Export_License_Exp_Date

Attribute.Description: This field indicates whether the ship node tracks inventory. The value is defaulted to 'TRACK' if the flag InventoryTracked is set to 'Y' and it is defaulted to 'INFINITE' if flag InventoryTracked is set to 'N'.
Attribute.Name: Inventorytype

Attribute.Description: The default value the ship node may declare for its shipments.
Attribute.Name: Default_Declared_Value

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the ship node maintains inventory cost.
Attribute.Name: Maintain_Inventory_Cost

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the ship node tracks inventory. Valid values are 'Y' or 'N'. Default Value is 'Y'.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Tracked

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the ship node can perform shipping operations. This flag does not have any functionality. Reserved for future use.
Attribute.Name: Shipping_Node

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the ship node can perform receiving operations. This flag does not have any functionality. Reserved for future use.
Attribute.Name: Receiving_Node

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the ship node can perform reverse logistic operations. This flag does not have any functionality. Reserved for future use.
Attribute.Name: Returns_Node

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the ship node is a 3PL node.
Attribute.Name: Three_Pl_Node

Attribute.Description: The number of days before which the ship node needs notification of an impending receipt or shipment.
Attribute.Name: Advance_Notification_Time

Attribute.Description: The time in hours required to process an incoming procurement (purchase or transfer) order after receiving it.
Attribute.Name: Receipt_Processing_Time

Attribute.Description: The time in hours required to process an incoming shipment that is being forwarded to this node.
Attribute.Name: Receipt_Processing_Time_For_Forwarding

Attribute.Description: The time in days required to process incoming future supply before being available for orders. Default: 0.
Attribute.Name: Receipt_Processing_Time_For_Future_Inventory

Attribute.Description: The number of days before which an order line cannot be scheduled at the node.
The number of days before which the communication to ship the order to the shipping node or supplier should be made. This field is used to determine the earliest ship date on the line.
Attribute.Name: Min_Notification_Time

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether this node can be setup for procuring inventory from other nodes for shipment.
Attribute.Name: Procure_To_Ship_Allowed

Attribute.Description: This field determines whether a node is allowed to use substitute items.
Attribute.Name: Substitution_Allowed

Attribute.Description: This field determines whether a node is allowed to create work orders.
Attribute.Name: Work_Order_Creation_Allowed

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether delayed inventory allocation is supported or not.
Attribute.Name: Delayed_Inventory_Allocation_Support

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether Pending inventory to be considered for allocation.
Attribute.Name: Ignore_Pending_Allocation

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether this node is only used a cross-doc node.
Attribute.Name: X_Doc_Node

Attribute.Description: Thie flag indicates whether the node will use the end of shift time.
Attribute.Name: Use_End_Of_Shift_Time

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the node can ship to other addresses.
Attribute.Name: Can_Ship_To_Other_Addresses

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the node can ship to all node/node types. Entries in YFS_NODE_CAN_SHIP_TO_NT table will be ignored if flag is Y.
Attribute.Name: Can_Ship_To_All_Nodes

Attribute.Description: The one up sequence number for tracking paper trail.
Attribute.Name: Bol_Prefix

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the order line will need to wait for acceptance, if this node is used as procure from node on the line.
Attribute.Name: Require_Transfer_Acceptance

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the node is allowed for Item-Based Allocation process. Valid values: Y/N. Default value: Y.
Attribute.Name: Is_IBA_Allowed

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether resource planning is enabled for this node.
Attribute.Name: Resource_Planning_Enabled

Attribute.Description: Indicates the time UOM in which resources are planned in a node. Valid values are WorkDay and Hours.
Attribute.Name: Resource_Planning_UOM

Attribute.Description: The planning calendar that is associated with this ship node.
Attribute.Name: Planning_Calendar_Key

Attribute.Description: Difference percent to be considered to resolve mismatch between supply and demand during resource planning.
Attribute.Name: Supply_Demand_Diff_Threshold

Attribute.Description: Number of person hours that make a person day.
Attribute.Name: Default_Person_Day_Hours

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the node is a fulfillment node.
Attribute.Name: Is_Fulfillment_Node

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether this node is a Yard.
Attribute.Name: Is_Yard

Attribute.Description: The field indicates whether the dock sheduling is done by Warehouse Management System or Sterling TMS. Blank value is treated as Warehouse Management System.
Attribute.Name: Dock_Scheduling

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates that the node allows gift wrapping.
Attribute.Name: Allow_Gift_Wrap
Store_Inv_Config
Attribute.Description: The type of the Store Inventory Config. Null or '00' means not SIM Enabled Store. '01' means SIM-enabled Store and Inventory IS Store managed. '02' means SIM-enabled Store but Inventory IS NOT Store managed.
The cost of handling an incoming procurement order at the receving node that has specified node type. Indicates cost per shipment.
Attribute.Name: Proc_Handling_Cst_Per_Shp

Attribute.Description: The cost of handling an outbound shipment at the shipping node that has specified node type. Indicates cost per shipment.
Attribute.Name: Out_Handling_Cst_Per_Shp

Attribute.Description: The cost of handling an incoming procurement order at the receving node that has specified node type. Indicates cost per line.
Attribute.Name: Proc_Handling_Cst_Per_Shp_Ln

Attribute.Description: The cost of handling an outbound shipment at the shipping node that has specified node type. Indicates cost per line.
Attribute.Name: Out_Handling_Cst_Per_Shp_Ln

Attribute.Description: The cost of handling an incoming procurement order at the receving node that has specified node type. Indicates cost per item unit.
Attribute.Name: Proc_Handling_Cst_Per_Unit

Attribute.Description: The cost of handling an outbound shipment at the shipping node that has specified node type. Indicates cost per item unit.
Attribute.Name: Out_Handling_Cst_Per_Unit

Attribute.Description: The cost of handling an incoming procurement order at the receving node that has specified node type. Indicates cost per item unit weight.
Attribute.Name: Proc_Hndl_Cst_Per_Unit_Weight

Attribute.Description: The cost of handling an outbound shipment at the receving node that has specified node type. Indicates cost per item unit weight.
Attribute.Name: Out_Hndl_Cst_Per_Unit_Weight

Attribute.Description: Weight Unit Of Measure for Procurements.
Attribute.Name: Proc_Weight_UOM

Attribute.Description: Weight Unit Of Measure for Outbound Shipments.
Attribute.Name: Out_Weight_UOM

Attribute.Description: Indicates currency which handling costs are specified in.
Attribute.Name: Currency

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the code is maintained by suppliers.
Attribute.Name: Meant_For_Supplier

Attribute.Description: Indicates if a rule is meant to be used by a supplier.
Attribute.Name: Meant_For_Supplier

Attribute.Description: This field is currently not supported.
Attribute.Name: Extend_Supplier_Flag

Attribute.Description: Indicates if a modification needs to be propogated to a chained order.
Attribute.Name: Propagate_To_Chained_Order

Attribute.Description: Indicates if a modification requires recomputation of prices.
Attribute.Name: Reprice_Order

Attribute.Description: The supplier code associated with the exception.
Attribute.Name: Supplier_Key

Attribute.Description: The order associated with the exception.
Attribute.Name: Order_Header_Key

Attribute.Description: The order number associated with the exception.
Attribute.Name: Order_No

Attribute.Description: The shipment associated with this exception.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_Key

Attribute.Description: The shipment number.
Attribute.Name: Shipment_No

Attribute.Description: The load number.
Attribute.Name: Load_No

Attribute.Description: The identifier for the item associated with the exception.
Attribute.Name: Item_Id

Attribute.Description: The order line associated with the exception.
Attribute.Name: Order_Line_Key

Attribute.Description: The work order associated with the exception.
Attribute.Name: Work_Order_Key

Attribute.Description: The work order number within the context of a node and enterprise.
Attribute.Name: Work_Order_No

Attribute.Description: The move request associated with this exception.
Attribute.Name: Move_Request_Key

Attribute.Description: The location identifier. Identifies the location for which exception is raised.
Attribute.Name: Location_Id

Attribute.Description: Indicates a customer associated with the exception.
Attribute.Name: Bill_To_Id

Attribute.Description: Indicates a team associated with the exception.
Attribute.Name: Team_Code

Attribute.Description: A user specified label for an address.
Attribute.Name: Address_Id

Attribute.Description: The truncated zip code used to match the region.
Attribute.Name: Short_Zip_Code

Attribute.Description: Indicates maximum number of customers that can be assigned to this user.
Attribute.Name: Max_Cust_Assign

Attribute.Description: Indicates if the user is a supervisor. Default is N.
Attribute.Name: Is_Supervisor

Attribute.Description: Indicates Display User's ID which is used for login in to the system.
Attribute.Name: Display_User_ID

Attribute.Description: The Customer Master Organization Code of the User's Organization.
Attribute.Name: Enterprise_Code

Attribute.Description: Flag to indicate if the user is a valid customer.
Attribute.Name: Is_Customer

Attribute.Description: Access mode for Customer. Indicates if the team can access all customer data (01), only specified customers (02) assigned to the team, or only specified customers assigned directly to the user, regardless of the Enterprise's manual assignment rule (03). Default Value is 01.
Attribute.Name: Customer_Access_Mode

Attribute.Description: Defines what purpose the user group is for.
Attribute.Name: Purpose

Attribute.Description: The organization that owns the catalog of this organization.
Attribute.Name: Organization_Code
